15548.en: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>, I'm glad you're here.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15548.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>か。
　よく来てくれたな。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15548.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc>.
　어서 와라.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15548.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>哦，<pc>。
你来了啊。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15548.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>喔喔，<pc>。
歡迎啊。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15549.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>You have business with the Village King? I'm sorry, but
the Village King has been away a lot lately. Could
you come back later?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15549.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「村王に　用だったか？
　残念だが　村王は　このところ不在がちでな。
　また　来てもらえるか。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15549.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 촌왕님께 볼일이 있는 거냐?
　안됐지만 촌왕님께서는 최근 들어 자주
　자리를 비우셔서 말이다. 다음에 다시 와다오.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15549.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>找村王有事吗？
很不巧，最近他经常外出。
以后再来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15549.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>找村王有事嗎？
很不巧，最近他經常外出。
之後再來吧。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15550.en: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>No... Just a minute.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15550.ja: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「いや……。ちょっと待ってくれるか。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15550.ko: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 아니……. 잠시만 기다려다오.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15550.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>呃……稍等一下。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15550.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>呃……稍等一下。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15551.en: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>To be honest, about the Village King being gone...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15551.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「じつは　村王が　不在がちなことについて
　相談があるのだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15551.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 실은 촌왕님의 잦은 부재와 관련해
　네게 의논할 게 있다…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15551.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>其实，我有事想跟你商量……
是关于村王最近总外出的事。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15551.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>其實，我有事想跟你商量……
是關於村王最近老是外出的事。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15552.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Ever since the day you rescued the Village King from
Snowy Mountain, he has been acting strangely.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15552.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「<pc>が　雪山から
　村王を　救出してくれた日から
　どうも村王は　様子が　おかしくてな。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15552.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 네가 설산에서
　촌왕님을 구해낸 뒤부터
　촌왕님이 좀 이상해지셔서 말이다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15552.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001><pc>从雪山把村王接回来以后，
我就总觉得村王变得有些奇怪。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15552.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>自從<pc>到雪山
把村王救回來的那天起，
總覺得村王變得有些奇怪。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15553.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Like the other day: teaching the ritual to the children
for some reason, passing on his roles to others, and
starting to get his affairs in order...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15553.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「先日の儀式のように　子供たちに何かを教えたり
　自分の役目を　人に引き継いだり
　次々に　身の回りの整理を　始めていてな……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15553.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 저번 의식처럼 아이들에게 뭔가를 가르치시거나
　본인 업무를 다른 사람에게 인계하시면서
　조금씩 신변 정리를 하고 계신다…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15553.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>前些日子举行了仪式教导孩子们，
还将自己的工作转手他人，
一件件地交代自己身边的事务……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15553.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>前些日子舉行了儀式教導孩子們，
還將自己的工作轉手他人，
一件件地交代自己身邊的事務……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15554.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>At first, I thought he was just concerned about his age,
but recently, I have come to feel that he may be going
a little too far.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15554.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「最初は　トシを気にされてのことかと
　見守っていたが　最近は　それも　少々
　行き過ぎではないかと　感じるほどなのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15554.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 처음에는 나이를 신경 쓰시는 건가 싶어서
　잠자코 지켜봤다만 최근 들어
　조금 도가 지나치다는 느낌이 든다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15554.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>开始我以为他是介意自己上了年纪，
所以一直在留意他。
但最近我感觉他的行为有点过头。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15554.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>一開始我以為他是介意自己上了年紀，
所以一直在留意他。
但最近感覺他的行為有點過頭。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15555.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>It's as though... The Village King is planning on
leaving the village, isn't it...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15555.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「まるで……村王は　この村を
　出ていこうとでもしているのではないかと
　思うほどに……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15555.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 마치…… 촌왕님께서
　마을을 떠나시려는 게 아닌가 하는
　생각까지 들 만큼…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15555.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我甚至开始怀疑村王这样子……
就像要离开这个村子一样。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15555.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我甚至開始懷疑
村王這樣子……
就像要離開這個村子一樣。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15556.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>I hope I'm just overthinking, but I want you,
<pc>, to find out what the Village King is doing
in his absence from the village.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15556.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「思いすごしであれば　よいのだが
　<pc>には　村王が　村を不在にして
　何をしているのかを　調べてほしいのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15556.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 내 기우라면 좋겠다만
　<pc>, 네가 촌왕님께서 어디서
　뭘 하고 계시는 건지 조사해 줬으면 한다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15556.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>但愿是我多心了，
希望<pc>你帮我调查一下
村王离开村子之后都在做什么。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15556.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>但願是我多心了，
希望<pc>你幫我調查一下，
村王出了村子後都在做什麼。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15557.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>As long as I know what it is, my mind will be at ease.
Of course, we'll have to keep it a secret from the
Village King, but will you do it?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15557.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「それさえわかれば　私も　安心できる。
　もちろん　村王には　内密の上でだが
　やってもらえるだろうか？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15557.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 그것만 알면 나도 걱정을 덜 수 있을 테니까.
　물론 촌왕님께는 비밀로 하고.
　맡아 줄 수 있겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15557.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>只要明白了这点，我也能放心了。
当然，这件事对村王要保密。
你能帮助我吗？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15557.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>只要明白了這點，我也能放心了。
當然，這件事對村王要保密。
你能幫我嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26333.en:
You have been asked to do a quest. Do you accept?
<select>
Accept
Decline
<select_end><close>
26333.ja:
クエストを　依頼されました。
このクエストを　受けますか？
<select>
うける
やめる
<select_end><close>
26333.ko:
퀘스트 의뢰를 받았습니다.
이 퀘스트를 수락하겠습니까?
<select>
수락하기
그만두기
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hans:
对方委托了任务。
要接受这个任务吗？
<select>
接受
放弃
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hant:
對方提出了任務委託。
是否要承接這件任務？
<select>
承接
放棄
<select_end><close>

15558.en: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Oh, really? I'm in your debt!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15558.ja: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「おおっ　本当か！　恩に着るぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15558.ko: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 오오, 정말이냐!? 고맙다!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15558.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>噢，真的吗！感激不尽！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15558.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>喔喔，真的嗎！感激不盡！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15559.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>In that case, first it would be a good idea to gather
eyewitness information from the villagers. The Village
King stands out wherever he is.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15559.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「そういうことなら　まずは　村人たちから
　目撃情報を集めるのが　よいだろう。
　村王は　どこにいても　目立つからな。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15559.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 우선 마을 사람들에게
　목격 정보부터 모으는 게 좋을 거다.
　촌왕님은 어디에 계시든 눈에 띄시니까.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15559.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>调查这件事
最好先从村民那里收集目击情报。
毕竟村王不管走到哪里都很显眼。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15559.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>調查這件事
最好先從村民那裡收集目擊情報。
畢竟村王不管走到哪裡都很顯眼。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15560.en: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Well then, I'll leave it to you!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15560.ja: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「それでは　よろしく頼んだぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15560.ko: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 그럼 잘 부탁하마!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15560.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>那么，就拜托你啦！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15560.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>那麼，就拜託你啦！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

15561.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Oh, really? I'm in your debt!
...Is what I would like to say, but it seems you
have a too many requests right now...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15561.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「おおっ　恩に着るぞ……と言いたいところだが
　どうやら　今は　頼まれごとが
　いっぱいのようだな……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15561.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 오오, 고맙다……라고 하고 싶지만
　보아하니 지금은
　부탁받은 일이 많은 것 같군…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15561.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>噢噢，感激不尽……
但是你现在好像还有很多
其他任务要做呢……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15561.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>喔喔，感激不盡……雖然我很想這麼說，
但你現在好像還有很多
委託的事要處理……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15562.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>I can't force you to do it, but this is urgent too.
When you're free, I'd like you to listen to
my request.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15562.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「無理強いはできんが
　できるなら　手を空けてきて
　私の頼みを　聞いてほしいところだ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15562.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 힘들면 어쩔 수 없지만
　가능하면 짬을 내서
　내 부탁을 들어다오.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15562.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我不强迫你。
可以的话，希望你腾出时间后，
再来接受我的委托。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15562.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我不強迫你，
可以的話，希望你騰出時間後，
再來承接我的委託。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15563.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>I-I see... Well, if you change your mind, please come
back again. Before something irreversible happens...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15563.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「そ　そうか……。
　では　気が変わったら　また来てくれ。
　取りかえしのつかないことになる前にな……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15563.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 그, 그렇군…….
　그럼 마음이 바뀌면 다시 와다오.
　돌이킬 수 없는 일이 벌어지기 전에…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15563.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>是……是吗……
那等你改变主意以后再来吧。
在事情变得无法挽回之前……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15563.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>這、這樣啊……
那等你改變主意以後再來吧。
在事情變得無法挽回之前……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15564.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>, you came back again.
You will listen to my request, won't you?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15564.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>。
　また来てくれたか。
　私の頼みを　聞いてくれるのだな？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15564.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc>.
　다시 온 건가.
　내 부탁을 들어주려고?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15564.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>哦，<pc>。
你又来啦。
能听听我的委托吗？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15564.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>喔喔，<pc>。
你又來啦。
能聽聽我的委託嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15565.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Ever since the day you rescued the Village King from
Snowy Mountain, he has been acting strangely.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15565.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「<pc>が　雪山から
　村王を　救出してくれた日から
　どうも村王は　様子が　おかしくてな。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15565.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 네가 설산에서
　촌왕님을 구해낸 뒤부터
　촌왕님이 좀 이상해지셔서 말이다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15565.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001><pc>从雪山把村王接回来以后，
我就总觉得村王变得有些奇怪。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15565.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>自從<pc>到雪山
把村王救回來的那天起，
總覺得村王變得有些奇怪。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15566.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Starting to get his affairs in order,
it's as though... The Village King is planning on
leaving the village, isn't it...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15566.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「次々に　身辺整理を始められ
　まるで……村王は　この村から出ていこうとでも
　お考えなのではないかと　思うほどに……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15566.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 자꾸 신변 정리를 하시는 게
　마치…… 촌왕님께서 마을을 떠날 준비를
　하시는 것처럼 느껴질 정도다…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15566.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>他开始逐一处理身边事务。
看这架势……
就跟要离开这个村子一样……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15566.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>他開始逐一處理身邊事務。
感覺就像是……
準備要離開這個村子一樣……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15567.en:
, I want you to find out what the Village King is doing in his absence from the village.
Of course, we'll have to keep it a secret from the Village King, but will you do it?
15567.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「<pc>には　村王が　何をしているのかを
　調べてほしいのだ。もちろん　村王には
　内密の上でな。やってもらえるか？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15567.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 그래서 네가 촌왕님께서 뭘 하고 계신지
　조사해 줬으면 한다. 물론 촌왕님께는
　비밀로 하고. 맡아 줄 수 있겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15567.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>希望<pc>能帮我调查村王最近在干什么。
当然，此事要对村王保密。
你能帮我吗？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15567.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>希望<pc>能幫我調查村王最近在做什麼。
當然，此事要對村王保密。
你能幫我嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15568.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>. It seems the investigation into
what Village King is doing is ongoing.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15568.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>。
　村王が　何をしているかは
　まだ調査中のようだな。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15568.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc>.
　촌왕님께서 뭘 하고 계신지는
　아직 조사 중인 모양이군.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15568.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>哦，<pc>。
看样子你还在调查村王最近在干什么吧。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15568.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>喔喔，<pc>。
看樣子你還在調查
村王最近在做什麼吧。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15569.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>The game is afoot! Anyway, it would be a good idea to
gather eyewitness information from the villagers.
The Village King stands out wherever he is.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15569.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「調査の基本は足だ！　とにかく　村人たちから
　目撃情報を集めるのが　よいだろう。
　村王は　どこにいても　目立つからな。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15569.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 조사의 기본은 발로 뛰는 거다!
　우선 마을 사람들에게 목격 정보를 모아 봐라.
　촌왕님은 어디에 계시든 눈에 띄시니까.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15569.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>调查的基础是打听！
总之先从村民那里收集目击情报吧。
毕竟村王走到哪里都很显眼。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15569.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>調查的基礎是打聽！
總之先從村民那裡收集目擊情報吧。
畢竟村王走到哪裡都很顯眼。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15570.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>I've gotten so very old... After all, it's been
20 years since then.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15570.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「私も　ずいぶん　トシをとりました。
　……なにしろ　あれから２０年です。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15570.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 저도 많이 늙었습니다.
　……그 뒤로 벌써 20년이나 흘렀으니까요.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15570.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我还真是上了年纪呢。
毕竟……自那以后已经过去２０年了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15570.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我還真是上了年紀呢。
畢竟……自那以後已經過去２０年了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15571.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Your son has trained himself to the upper limits...
And is coming to kill me. No doubt his strength is
beyond imagination, isn't it.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15571.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「あなたの血を引く息子が　極限まで
　きたえあげて……　わしを　殺しにきます。
　きっと　想像を絶する強さでしょうな。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15571.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 당신의 피를 이은 아들이
　극한까지 단련해…… 절 죽이러 올 겁니다.
　상상도 못 할 만큼 강할 테죠.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15571.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>你的儿子继承了你的血脉，
修行到了极限……要来杀我。
想必他已经强大到超乎想象了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15571.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>你兒子繼承了你的血脈，
修行到了極限……要來殺我。
想必他已經強大到超乎想像了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15572.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>I will neither run nor hide. I will only take on the
challenge with all the power my body possesses...<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15572.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「わしは　逃げも隠れもしません。
　今　持っている　すべてのチカラで
　ただ　受けて立つのみです……。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15572.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 하지만 전 도망치지 않을 겁니다.
　제가 가진 모든 힘을 다해
　그 아이에게 맞설 겁니다…….<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15572.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我不想逃，也不想躲。
现在，只想做好准备，
等待那一刻的到来……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15572.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我不逃也不藏。
現在只想做好準備，
等待那一刻的到來……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15573.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Oh, it's...<pc>? In a place like this, what are
you doing here?<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15573.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>……か？
　こんな所で　いったい何を……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15573.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc> 아니냐……?
　이런 곳에서 대체 뭘……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15573.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>哦，是<pc>……吗？
你来这里做什么……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15573.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>喔喔，是<pc>……嗎？
你來這裡做什麼……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15574.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>...I see. Perhaps that Gyuran must've sent you to look
for me. He really is a worrier, isn't he?<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15574.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「……なるほど。
　おおかた　ギュランのやつが探させたのだろう。
　まったく　あいつは　心配性だな。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15574.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: ……그래, 보나 마나
　규란 녀석이 날 찾아 달라고 했겠지.
　나 원, 그 녀석은 걱정이 많아서 탈이라니까.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15574.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我知道了……
多半是久朗那家伙让你来找我的吧。
真是的，那家伙就爱瞎操心。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15574.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>……原來如此。
多半是久朗那傢伙讓你來找我的吧。
真是的，那傢伙就愛瞎操心。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15575.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Gyuran was frail as a child. But, by nature, hated to
lose. Because of his fraility, he studied hard.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15575.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「ギュランは　子供の頃から　身体が弱かった。
　だが　生来の負けず嫌いでな。
　身体が弱い分　とにかく熱心に勉強した。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15575.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 규란은 어린 시절부터 몸이 약했다.
　하지만 타고나길 지기 싫어하는 성미라
　몸이 약한 만큼 공부에 힘을 쏟았지.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15575.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>久朗自小身体就不好。
但他生来就是个不服输的孩子。
虽然身子很弱，但学习特别努力。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15575.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>久朗自小身體就不好。
但他生來就是個不服輸的孩子。
雖然身子很弱，但學習特別努力。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15576.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>He is now one of the most outstanding, intelligent
people among Ogres that one could meet. I'm happy to
have someone like him as my aide.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15576.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そのかいあって　今では　オーガの中では
　飛び抜けて　アタマがいい。わしは　あいつの
　そんなところを気に入って　側近にした。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15576.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 그 덕에 지금은 오거 중에서
　독보적으로 머리가 좋아. 난 그 녀석의
　그런 점이 마음에 들어서 측근으로 삼았다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15576.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>所以，如今这里的奥伽之中，
他的头脑出奇地好。
我很欣赏他这点，就把他留在身边。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15576.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>所以，如今這裡的奧伽之中，
他的頭腦出奇地好。
我很欣賞他這點，就把他留在身邊。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15577.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>That said... It's understandable that Gyuran was
concerned.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15577.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「しかし……　ギュランに
　心配をかけたのは　無理もなかったか……。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15577.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 하지만……
　규란이 걱정하는 것도 당연하겠군…….<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15577.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>但是……
也难怪久朗会担心……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15577.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>但是……
也難怪久朗會擔心……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15578.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001><pc>, this tomb is for someone whom, in my
youth, I had a friendly competition with and was
like a brother to me.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15578.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。この墓はな　わしが若い頃
　互いに切磋琢磨した　兄貴分の墓なのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15578.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 이 무덤은 내가 젊은 시절에
　함께 수련했던 형님 같은 이의 무덤이다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15578.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001><pc>啊。这墓碑是我年轻的时候，
互相切磋武艺的大哥的墓碑。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15578.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001><pc>啊。這是我大哥的墓碑，
年輕時，我們很常互相切磋武藝。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15579.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>His name was Gagabes. His strength was, far and away,
greater than that of someone like myself. He was called
the strongest champion ever and was the village's hero.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15579.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「名を　ガガベスといった。
　わしなどよりも　はるかに強く　史上最強の
　チャンピオンと呼ばれた　村の英雄だった。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15579.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 이름은 가가베스.
　나와는 비교도 안 될 만큼 강해 사상 최강의
　챔피언이라 불린 마을의 영웅이었다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15579.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>他名叫贾贾贝斯。
他的强大远胜于我，
被称为史上最强的胜者，曾是村里的英雄。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15579.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>他名叫卡卡貝斯。
他的強大遠勝於我，
被稱為史上最強的勝者，曾是村裡的英雄。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15580.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>No matter how many times I challenged him, I truly
couldn't compete with Gagabes. But one day, during
a match...<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15580.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「わしは　何度　挑んでも
　まったく　ガガベスに　歯が立たなかった。
　だが　ある日の　試合でのことだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15580.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 몇 번을 덤벼도 내 실력으론
　가가베스를 이길 수 없었지.
　그러던 어느 날, 시합 중의 일이었다…….<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15580.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我曾向贾贾贝斯挑战过很多次，
但完全不是他的对手。
但是，在一次比赛中……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15580.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我曾多次向卡卡貝斯挑戰，
但完全不是他的對手。
可是在一次比賽中……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15581.en: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>It was like my fist was sucked into Gagabes' gut...<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15581.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「わしの拳が　吸い込まれるように
　ガガベスの　みぞおちに入ってしまった……。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15581.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 내 주먹이 마치 빨려 들어간 것처럼
　가가베스의 명치를 정확히 가격했다…….<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15581.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我的拳头就像被什么吸住了一样，
打穿了贾贾贝斯的胸口……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15581.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我的拳頭就像被什麼吸住了一樣，
擊中了卡卡貝斯的胸口……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15582.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>That hit was nothing more than a stroke of luck.
But because of that blow, Gagabes left this world on
the ground of the arena.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15582.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「それは　ただの幸運な一撃に過ぎなかった。
　だが　ガガベスは　その一撃によって
　そのまま　武闘場の上で　この世を去ったのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15582.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 그건 단순한 요행에 불과했어.
　하지만 가가베스는 그 일격으로
　무투장 위에서 그대로 숨을 거두고 말았다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15582.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>那只不过是侥幸的一击。
但是，贾贾贝斯却因为这一击在比武场上丧了命。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15582.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>那只不過是僥倖的一擊。
但是，卡卡貝斯卻因為這一擊
在武鬥場上喪了命。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15583.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>I was completely dumbstruck by that, but the birth
of a new champion had the villagers in an uproar.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15583.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「あまりのことに　わしは唖然としていたが
　新たなチャンピオンの誕生に
　村の人々は　沸き返った。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15583.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 갑작스러운 사고에 얼이 빠진
　나와는 달리 마을 사람들은
　새로운 챔피언의 탄생에 열광했다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15583.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我被眼前的景象惊呆了，
而村民们都为新冠军的诞生欢呼雀跃。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15583.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我被眼前的景象嚇呆了，
而村民們都為新冠軍的誕生
歡呼雀躍。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15584.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>In those days of Rangao Village, winning was valued
above all else.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15584.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「当時のランガーオ村は　なによりも
　勝つことこそが　尊ばれた時代だったのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15584.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 당시 랑가오 마을에서는
　승리가 곧 정의였으니까.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15584.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>那时的兰加奥村处在一个只尊崇胜者的时代。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15584.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>那時的蘭加奧村處在一個
尊崇勝者的時代。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15585.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>And the losers were dealt a cruel blow. Gagabes' status
as the hero, instantly, came crashing down upon his
death.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15585.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そして　敗者には　残酷な仕打ちが与えられた。
　英雄だったガガベスの地位は
　死によって　一瞬にして　地に墜ちた。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15585.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 그런 만큼 패자에게는 더없이 잔혹했다.
　영웅이었던 가가베스가 죽자
　그 위상이 하루아침에 땅에 떨어졌다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15585.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>然而败者会遭到残酷的对待。
在他死去的瞬间，
贾贾贝斯的英雄地位就崩塌了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15585.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>而敗者則會遭到殘酷的對待。
在他死去的瞬間，
卡卡貝斯的英雄地位就崩塌了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15586.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Gagabes' wife and son from that time on were called
the weakling's family and subjected to a life of terrible
poverty and persecution...<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15586.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「ガガベスには　奥さんと　息子がいたが
　それ以来　弱き者の家族として　しいたげられ
　ひどく貧しい生活を　強いられたと聞く……。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15586.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 가가베스에게는 부인과 아들이 있었는데
　그 뒤로는 약자의 가족이라며 멸시당하고
　생활마저 궁핍해졌다고 들었다…….<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15586.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>贾贾贝斯有一妻一儿，
听说自那以后，他们就成了弱者的家人被人欺负，
被迫过着非常贫困的生活……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15586.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>卡卡貝斯有一妻一兒，
聽說自那以後，他們就成了弱者的家人被人欺負，
被迫過著非常貧困的生活……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15587.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>The hardships tormented his wife and she passed a few
years later, leaving their son all by himself.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15587.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「苦労がたたってか　奥さんは　数年後になくなり
　息子が　ひとり残された。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15587.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 모진 고생을 견디지 못한 것인지
　몇 년 후 부인도 죽고 아들만이 홀로 남았지.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15587.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>几年后，不堪重负的妻子去世了，
只留下一个儿子。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15587.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>幾年後，不堪重負的妻子去世了，
只留下一個兒子。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15588.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Their son's name is Gagai... He was only 6 years old
at the time, but came up to me one day and said:<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15588.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「その息子の名は　ガガイ……。
　当時　まだ６才だったガガイは
　ある日　わしの前に来て　こう言った。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15588.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 그 아들의 이름은 가가이…….
　당시 고작 6살이었던 가가이는
　어느 날 날 찾아와 이렇게 말했다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15588.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>这孩子名叫贾贾伊……
当时贾贾伊只有6岁。
有一天他来到我面前，对我说：<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15588.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>那個兒子名叫卡卡伊……
當時卡卡伊只有６歲。
有一天他來到我面前，對我說：<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15589.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>''One day, I will surely kill you. And I'll do whatever
it takes to make that happen''...<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15589.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「いつか　必ず　お前を殺す。
　そのために　どんなことでもする……とな。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15589.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 언젠가 반드시 널 죽이겠다.
　그걸 위해서라면 무슨 짓이든 하겠다고…….<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15589.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>“总有一天我会杀了你。
为此我将不惜任何代价……”<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15589.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>總有一天我會殺了你。
為此我將不惜任何代價……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15590.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>...That was 20 years ago. Soon after, Gagai left the
village, and we didn't even know if he was still alive.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15590.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「……今から　２０年前のことだ。
　ガガイは　そのまま村を出ていき　ずっと
　生きているかどうかさえ　わからなかった。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15590.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: ……지금으로부터 20년 전의 일이다.
　가가이는 그 길로 마을을 떠났고
　여태 생사조차 알 수 없었다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15590.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>这是２０年前的事了……
我一直不知道离开村子的贾贾伊是死是活。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15590.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>這是２０年前的事了……
我一直不知道離開村子的卡卡伊
是死是活。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15591.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>And on that day you saved me... A letter from Gagai
came.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15591.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そして　お前に助けてもらった　あの日……
　そのガガイから　手紙が来たのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15591.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 그런데 네가 날 구해준 그날……
　가가이에게서 편지가 도착했다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15591.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>然而，被你搭救的那天……
我收下了贾贾伊的来信。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15591.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>然而，被你搭救的那天……
我收到了卡卡伊的來信。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15592.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>In the letter, he wrote only a few words:
''I'm coming to kill you''...<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15592.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「手紙には　ただ一言　こう書いてあった。
　お前を　殺しにいく……とな。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15592.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 편지에는 단 한마디만 적혀 있더군.
　널 죽이러 가겠다……라고.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15592.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>信中只写了一句话。
“我要去杀了你……”<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15592.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>信中只寫了一句話。
「我會去殺了你」……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15593.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>I am old, but I shall neither run nor hide. Rather, I
planned on going to Gagai myself.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15593.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「わしは老いたが　逃げも隠れもせん。
　むしろ　こちらから　ガガイの所に
　出向いていこうと思っているのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15593.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 비록 늙었어도 도망치거나 숨을 생각은 없다.
　오히려 내가 먼저
　가가이를 만나러 갈 계획이다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15593.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我已经上了年纪，不想逃也不想躲。
与其坐以待毙，
倒不如主动去找贾贾伊。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15593.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我雖然上了年紀，但是不逃也不藏。
甚至還打算
主動去找卡卡伊。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15594.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>It seems impossible to win... But I must face him with
all the strength I possess.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15594.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「勝つことは　難しいだろう……。
　だが　わしは　持てるチカラの　すべてをかけて
　やつとの勝負に　臨まねばならん。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15594.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 아마도 이기긴 힘들겠지…….
　하지만 난 내 모든 힘을 다해
　그 녀석과의 대결에 임해야 한다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15594.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>恐怕很难战胜他吧……
但是我想用现在的力量全力一搏，
直接面对和他的决斗。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15594.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>恐怕很難戰勝他吧……
但是我必須以現有的力量全力一搏，
直接面對和他的決鬥。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15595.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>I don't want anyone to worry needlessly. So, please,
don't tell Gyuran or the villagers about this.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15595.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「いらぬ心配は　かけたくない。
　このことは　ギュランや　村の連中には
　どうか　だまっていてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15595.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 괜한 걱정만 끼칠 테니
　이 일은 규란과 마을 사람들에게는
　비밀로 해다오.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15595.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我不想引起大家无谓的担心。
所以这件事请无论如何
请向久朗和村里的人们保密。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15595.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>我不想引起大家無謂的擔心。
所以這件事還請務必
對久朗和村裡的人們保密。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15596.en: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>This will be my final battle.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15596.ja: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「これが　わしの最後の戦いだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15596.ko: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 이게 내 마지막 싸움이다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15596.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>这是我的最后一战。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15596.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>這是我的最後一戰。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15597.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>That was a long story, wasn't it. Come on, let's go
back to the village.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15597.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「すっかり　長話になってしまったな。
　さあ　村へ帰ろう。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15597.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 이야기가 너무 길어졌군.
　자, 그만 마을로 돌아가지.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15597.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>一不留神，说了这么久。
快，回村子去吧。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15597.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>一不留神說了這麼久。
好了，回村子去吧。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15598.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>I'll tell Gyuran that I'm just fine. Anyways, please
keep quiet about what happened here.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15598.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「ギュランには　わしの方から
　うまいこと言っておく。とにかく
　ここでのことは　だまっていてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15598.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 규란에게는 내가 잘 둘러댈 테니
　여기서 나눈 이야기는 비밀로 해다오.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15598.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>久朗那边我会想办法蒙混过关的。
总之在这里跟你说的事一定不要告诉别人。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15598.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>久朗那邊我會想辦法蒙混過去的。
總之在這裡跟你說的事
還請務必保密。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15599.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>This is a promise between you and me. Got it?
GAHAHAHA!<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15599.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「これは　わしとお前の　約束だ。
　よいな？　ガハハハ！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15599.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 이건 너와 나의 약속이다.
　알았느냐? 으하하하!<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15599.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>这是我和你的约定。
听清楚了吗？啊哈哈哈！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15599.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>這是我和你的約定。
聽清楚了嗎？啊哈哈哈！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
